biotools.summary: Subtype and Stage Inference, or SuStaIn, is an algorithm for discovery of data-driven groups or "subtypes" in chronic disorders. This repository is the Python implementation of SuStaIn, with the option to describe the subtype progression patterns using either the event-based model, the piecewise linear z-score model or the scored events model.

bioschemas.name: pySuStaIn
